description: SOMDEVICES has introduced the µSMARC RZ/V2N, a System-on-Module based on the Renesas RZ/V2N processor. Designed for AI-driven machine learning, vision applications, and industrial automation, this module delivers high computational performance in a compact form factor. This module features the same Renesas processor as the V2N SOM by IMDT, which was covered earlier this month. Built […]
title: SOMDEVICES Expands SoM Lineup with µSMARC RZ/V2N for AI and Vision Applications
